title: Duke
description: The past walked back into my life—this time, with my daughter by her side.When Eden walked away eleven years ago, I let her go.I never imagined she was carrying my child. Never thought I’d wake up one day and find a little girl with my eyes standing on my doorstep.Sierra is mine. I feel it in my bones.And right behind her? Eden—the only woman I’ve ever loved.I’m no saint. Hell, I’m the last man who should be playing house.But now that I know the truth, I’ll fight like hell to make my family whole.No one is taking them from me. Not the past. Not the danger on our heels.Not even Eden herself.Duke (The Black Hornets MC #3) is a dark, steamy motorcycle club romance with a second-chance love story, secret baby twist, and an alpha bad boy who will fight to the death for the family he never knew he had.
author: Savannah Rylan
